Welcome to Mi Proyecto’s documentation!¶

class bank_account.BankAccount(owner: str, balance: float = 0.0)¶

Bases: object

A simple bank account class to manage deposits and withdrawals.

Parámetros:

  • owner (str) – The name of the account owner.

  • balance (float) – Initial account balance (default is 0.0).

deposit(amount: float) → None¶

Deposit money into the account.

Parámetros:

amount (float) – Amount of money to deposit.

Muestra:

ValueError – If the deposit amount is not positive.

get_balance() → float¶

Get the current balance of the account.

Devuelve:

Current account balance.

Tipo del valor devuelto:

float

withdraw(amount: float) → None¶

Withdraw money from the account.

Parámetros:

amount (float) – Amount of money to withdraw.

Muestra:

ValueError – If the withdrawal amount is greater than the current balance or not positive.

Bank_Python
